str2: Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
From akron and probably a modified form of posthe; the prepuce; by implication, an uncircumcised state or person.
